nodes.text: The term Sith tattoo referred to a number of different types of body markings that were used by followers of the dark side order and its factions. The One Sith under Darth Krayt were prominent practitioners of Sith tattooing. The application of Sith tattoos was painful, owing to the fact that they were applied via Sith pincerbugs.
List of individuals with Sith tattoos
